alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 2:21PM CDT until May 25 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Eastern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 221 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pala Alto to Sessums, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... West Point around 225 PM CDT. Tibbee and Bent Oak around 230 PM CDT. Columbus and Waverly around 240 PM CDT. Columbus AFB around 245 PM CDT. Kolola Springs and Steens around 250 PM CDT. Caledonia around 255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Artesia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
